triples.name: Propositional logic
triples.relevance: The foundation of the paper's work on Boolean reasoning and logical representation.

triples.name: Boolean algebra
triples.relevance: Core mathematical framework for Boolean logic encoding used in the paper.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Key application domain for propositional reasoning and verification techniques discussed.

triples.name: SAT solver
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly discusses propositional encodings suitable for SAT packages.

triples.name: Binary decision diagram
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly mentions BDD as a tool for analyzing propositional encodings.

triples.name: Constraint satisfaction problem
triples.relevance: Application area for propositional reasoning discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Application area for propositional encodings mentioned in the paper.

triples.name: Cryptography
triples.relevance: Application area where propositional reasoning techniques are applied.

triples.name: Validity (logic)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a model-theoretic account of checking logical validity in propositional encodings.

triples.name: Model theory
triples.relevance: The paper's main contribution is a model-theoretic approach to propositional reasoning problems.
